description:
We deliver this through six core disciplines: brand, corporate communications, corporate reporting, digital, employee engagement and video & motion graphics. We believe distinctive storytelling and captivating brands are the key drivers of positive reputation. Our expertise lies in defining the stories at the heart of businesses, evolving meaningful narrative and connecting in ways that engage best with the people you need to reach.
Our vibrant team of strategic innovators, problem solvers, creative craftsmen, content enhancers, digital savvies and dedicated deliverers can help you meet any challenge that a corporate communications professional might face. What sets us apart is the power of our strategic thinking. We don’t just win awards because what we do looks great. It’s the insight driving the ideas that makes our solutions both smarter and better looking. We have been widely recognised for our outstanding quality. Awards have included ‘Best Rebrand’, ‘Best Membership Publication’, ‘Best Annual Report’ and ‘Best Exhibition’. These have come from diverse industry bodies including D&AD, Design Week, CIM, IoIC, ICSA, Transform and the IR Society. The delivery of this award-winning quality across all design disciplines makes us a highly effective creative partner. It also led to us being recognised in the ‘Agency of the Decade’ category at the 2015 CorpComms Awards.
